Question: How can I register for the hackathon online?
Answer: You can register for the hackathon by visiting the Devfolio website. Simply navigate to the registration section to get started!

Question: Is there an offline registration option?
Answer: Unfortunately, there are no offline registration options available for this hackathon. All registrations must be completed online.

Question: What is the registration link?
Answer: The registeration link is https://devfolio.co/hackathons.

Question: Is there a registration form I need to fill out?
Answer: Yes, to complete your registration, you will need to fill out a registration form. This helps us gather important information about you and your team.

Question: Do I need to create an account to register?
Answer: Yes, you will need to create an account on the Devfolio website to register for the hackathon. This allows you to manage your registration and stay updated on event information.

Question: Can I register using my social media account?
Answer: Yes, you can conveniently register using your social media account! Just choose your preferred platform during the registration process to log in quickly.

Question: Is there a minimum age requirement for registration?
Answer: No, there is no minimum age requirement for registration. We welcome participants of all ages to join the hackathon!

Question: Can I register if I'm a student?
Answer: Absolutely! We encourage students to register for the event. It's a great opportunity to learn, collaborate, and network with other like-minded individuals.

Question: Can I register if I'm a professional?
Answer: Yes, professionals are definitely encouraged to register for the event! We believe that diverse participation enriches the experience for everyone involved and fosters valuable networking opportunities.

Question: Can I register if I'm from outside the city/state/country?
Answer: Yes We welcome participants from all locations.

Question: Is there a registration fee?
Answer: No, there is no registration fee for this hackathon. We welcome everyone to join without any financial barriers!

Question: What is the registration fee amount?
Answer: There is currently no registration fee required. We invite all interested participants to register for the hackathon at no cost!

Question: Are there any discounts or promotions for early registration?
Answer: At this time, we do not offer any discounts or promotions for early registration. However, we encourage you to register as soon as possible to secure your spot!

Question: Is there a refund policy for the registration fee?
Answer: Since there is no registration fee, there is no need for a refund policy. We want to ensure that participating in this hackathon is completely hassle-free!

Question: What happens if I miss the payment deadline?
Answer: No worries! There is no payment required for registration in this hackathon, so you donâ€™t have to worry about missing any payment deadlines.

Question: What is the last date for registration?
Answer: The last date for registration is the end of January. Be sure to register before then to secure your spot!

Question: Is there an extension for the registration deadline?
Answer: Currently, there is no extension for the registration deadline. However, if any changes occur, we will notify all participants immediately.

Question: How can I check my registration status?
Answer: You can easily check your registration status by logging into your account on the Devfolio website. All the details related to your registration will be available there.

Question: Can I modify my registration details after submitting?
Answer: Yes, you can modify your registration details even after submission! Simply log in to your account on the Devfolio website to make any necessary changes.

Question: Can I register as a team?
Answer: Yes, you can register as a team! Please make sure that all team members register under the same team name for consistency.

Question: What is the maximum team size?
Answer: The maximum team size for the hackathon is 4 members. Be sure to keep your team within this limit!

Question: Are there any restrictions on team composition?
Answer: No, there are no restrictions regarding team composition. We encourage diverse teams!

Question: Can I register as an individual?
Answer: Absolutely! You can register as an individual if you prefer not to join a team.

Question: Can I join an existing team?
Answer: Yes if you know a team that is looking for additional members, you can join an existing team. Please ensure you have their team code for registration.

Question: How do I form a team?
Answer: To form a team, gather your teammates and have one member register the team through the registration link. They will need to provide the team name and details.

Question: Can I change my team after registration?
Answer: Once registered, changes to team composition can be made by contacting our support team. Please provide the necessary details for any changes.

Question: Can I join multiple teams?
Answer: No Joining one team or participation individually is allowed only.

Question: When does the hackathon start?
Answer: It will start in Feb 1st week.

Question: What is the duration of the hackathon?
Answer: The hackathon will be a 3-day event, packed with exciting challenges and opportunities.

Question: Is there a specific theme for the hackathon?
Answer: There is no specific theme for this hackathon, allowing for a wide range of creative solutions!

Question: What is the event format (in-person, online, hybrid)?
Answer: The event will be in-person, meaning all teams must be present at the designated location.

Question: Is it possible to participate virtually?
Answer: Unfortunately, No you and your must be present at the designated location.

Question: Where will the hackathon be held?
Answer: The hackathon will take place at the IIIT Kota Campus. We look forward to seeing you there!

Question: What are the event timings?
Answer: Events will begin at 10:00 AM each day. Be sure to arrive on time!

Question: Is there a schedule for the event?
Answer: The detailed schedule of the event will be available in the first week of January. Stay tuned for updates!

Question: Are there any workshops or talks planned?
Answer: Yes there are events planned like CSS battle, Kaggle war and more.

Question: Is there a networking event?
Answer: Yes there are Open mike Sessions planned.

Question: Is there a hackathon after-party?
Answer: No there is no such thing planned for this hackathon.

Question: Is there a keynote speaker?
Answer: Yes there will be a speaker in inaugaration of hackathon.

Question: Who are the keynote speakers?
Answer: Name of the speaker will be announced on HackTheChain website.

Question: Are there any industry experts or celebrities attending?
Answer: Yes there are sessions planned for this.

Question: Will there be mentors available to guide participants?
Answer: Yes there will be mentors for guidance.

Question: Who are the mentors?
Answer: Codebase team will mentor you for any difficulties regarding ideation aspect.

Question: What are the mentors expertise?
Answer: For now Codebase team is mentoring you.

Question: How can I request a mentor?
Answer: You talk to any codebase member for any doubt.

Question: Can I meet with a mentor one-on-one?
Answer: CodeBase Team will be mentoring you.

Question: Is plagiarism allowed?
Answer: No plagiarism is strictly prohibited all work must be original and properly attributed.

Question: What are the consequences of plagiarism?
Answer: If plagiarism is detected the team or individual may face disqualification from the hackathon.

Question: What happens if I violate the rules of the hackathon?
Answer: Violating hackathon rules can result in warnings, penalties, and immediate disqualification depending on the severity of the infraction.

Question: Can I appeal a decision if I am disqualified?
Answer: Yes participants may appeal a disqualification decision, but the final decision rests with the codebase members.

Question: Is mentor support available throughout the event?
Answer: Yes the Codebase team will be available to mentor participants throughout the event to provide support and guidance.

Question: How can I contact a mentor?
Answer: You can reach out to a Codebase team mentor via the official communication channels such as  Discord, email or Instagram and LinkedIn handles.

Question: Can I request a mentor for specific help?
Answer: Yes you can request specific assistance from the Codebase team for any part of your project, whether technical or non-technical.

Question: Are there any limitations on the number of mentor requests?
Answer: There are no strict limitations, but we encourage you to be considerate and respectful of other participants' need for mentorship from the Codebase team.

Question: Can I get help with my project idea or development?
Answer: Absolutely! The Codebase team is here to assist with brainstorming, refining your project idea, and guiding you through development.

Question: Can I get feedback on my project from a mentor?
Answer: Yes the Codebase team will provide constructive feedback on your project to help you improve and optimize it.

Question: Can I get help with technical issues?
Answer: Yes the Codebase team is available to help troubleshoot and resolve any technical challenges you encounter during the hackathon.

Question: How do I know which mentor to approach?
Answer: A mentor list with their areas of expertise will be provided. You can choose a mentor based on your project's requirements or the specific skills you need help with.

Question: Are there any mentors with specific expertise in my area of interest?
Answer: Yes mentors with a wide range of expertise, including technical and domain-specific areas, will be available.

Question: Can I request a mentor based on their experience or background?
Answer: Absolutely! You are encouraged to request a mentor whose background and experience match the support you need for your project.

Question: Are there any mentors who have participated in previous hackathons?
Answer: Yes mentors have experience participating in and mentoring at hackathons, which makes them well-equipped to guide you through the challenges.

Question: Can I participate if I am a minor?
Answer: Yes you can participate.

Question: Is there a prize for the winning team?
Answer: Absolutely! winning team will get a prize of  $100 cash.

Question: What is the prize?
Answer: Winning team will get $100 cash.

Question: How will the winner be determined?
Answer: Best submitted idea and reliable approach to implement it will be declared as winner.

Question: Is there a judging panel?
Answer: Yes there will be judging panel.

Question: What are the judging criteria?
Answer: Most important part will be your idea and then execution.

Answer: Yes dress should be formal.

Answer: Yes there is canteen and food stalls at academic and entrance gate.

Question: Are there any accommodations available for participants?
Answer: No there will be no separate rooms for participants.

Question: Is there a transportation service provided?
Answer: Unfortunately, there won't be any transportation services available.

Question: Can I bring my own laptop or equipment?
Answer: Yes you can bring your own laptops.

Question: Is there a Wi-Fi connection available?
Answer: Yes connectivity will be provided.

Question: Can I use my phone during the event?
Answer: Yes you can use your phone during events.

Question: Are there any safety precautions in place?
Answer: Safety precautions aren't required for this event.

Question: Is there insurance coverage for participants?
Answer: Unfortunately there won't be any insurance coverage provided for participants.
